caption.title: Fully adjusted* hazard ratios (HRs) and corresponding 95% confidence intervals (95% CIs) of the association between taller body height at entry to adulthood and dementia diagnosis among brothers and twins

tr.th: HR (95% CI) for onset of dementia per one z-score* higher

fn.p: *Identify cohort-specific values of one z-score in Supplementary file 2.
†Model 3: Stratified by birth cohort and adjusted for conscript board district, educational level and intelligence test scores. Age included as underlying scale of the model.
